unittitle_ssm: Bennett family Bible and genealogical register
abstract_ssm: One illustrated Bible belonging to the Bennett family.  The Bible includes a pre-printed section dedicated to the recording of family genealogical information, in which handwritten records of birth, marriage, and death dates for members of the Bennett family spanning the period 1814 to 1936 are contained.  This genealogical information also illuminates the Bennett family's relation to other multigenerational Brooklyn families, including the Bergen, Duryea, Remsen, and Suydam families.
geogname_ssm: Brooklyn (New York, N.Y.) |x Religious life and customs
